articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Brewdog said the "difficult decision" had been taken as a result of "ongoing industry challenges".
articles.title: Brewdog to close 10 pubs across UK, some 'within days'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Judge rules that the estate of the late tech tycoon, who died when his boat sank last year, must pay out.
articles.title: Mike Lynch estate and business partner owe HP Enterprise £700m

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Officials say they want to ask Maxwell "what do you know?", as her lawyers confirm they are in discussions with the government.
articles.title: US justice department asks to meet Epstein conspirator Ghislaine Maxwell

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The ex-Unite chief enjoyed flights arranged by the firm building a controversial hotel, report seen by BBC says.
articles.title: Ex-union boss McCluskey took private jet flights arranged by building firm, report finds

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Kulsuma Akter had been living in a refuge in Bradford when she was fatally stabbed by Habibur Masum.
articles.title: Man who murdered wife pushing baby in Bradford jailed for life

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The Middle East has been transformed since 7 October, and almost two years on, the conflict in Gaza is at another inflection point.
articles.title: Jeremy Bowen: Israel's allies see evidence of war crimes in Gaza mounting up

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The former foreign secretary will become shadow housing secretary, the BBC understands.
articles.title: James Cleverly gets new job as Kemi Badenoch reshuffles team

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Rute Cardoso has shared photos of their 22 June wedding in a post to Instagram.
articles.title: Wife of Diogo Jota posts 'forever' tribute on wedding anniversary

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: UKTV, which presents the award, said it wanted to "reflect on how we continue to support comedy".
articles.title: Edinburgh Fringe's funniest joke award scrapped for 2025

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Households are trading down or making simpler meals to save money on groceries, research shows.
articles.title: Food bills on course to rise by £275 a year as prices jump
